patient_details.recent_exposure: Attended a wedding with rich food and alcohol

doctor_question: Where does it hurt and when did it start?
patient_response: Patient: "It's in my big toe, particularly the joint, and it started about a day and a half ago, maybe two days. I think it was after that wedding I attended over the weekend. We had a huge feast and I had a few drinks afterwards. Ever since then, I've been feeling this sharp pain and stiffness in my toe, especially when I put my weight on it or dress my foot."
